hero.title: Capture, manage and organize your screenshots

features.title: Powerful features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to capture and manage screenshots efficiently

instantCapture.title: Instant Capture
instantCapture.description: Global keyboard shortcuts for quick capture at any time. Support for full screen or region selection.

regionSelection.title: Region Selection
regionSelection.description: Choose between full screen capture or select a specific region with precision.

organizedLibrary.title: Organized Library
organizedLibrary.description: Manage all your screenshots in an intuitive library with preview, search and organization.

annotations.title: Annotations & Editing
annotations.description: Integrated drawing tools to add annotations, arrows, shapes and text to your screenshots.

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform
crossPlatform.description: Available for macOS, Windows and Linux. Works perfectly on any operating system.

minimalist.title: Minimalist Interface
minimalist.description: Clean design focused on productivity, without distractions. Intuitive and easy to use interface.

linux.title: Linux
linux.description: Treenshoter is available in multiple formats for different Linux distributions:

steps.1: AppImage: Universal, works on any distribution. Make the file executable and run it.
steps.2: DEB: For Debian/Ubuntu. Install with: sudo dpkg -i treenshoter_1.0.0_amd64.deb
steps.3: RPM: For Red Hat/Fedora. Install with: sudo rpm -i treenshoter-1.0.0.x86_64.rpm
steps.4: PACMAN: For Arch Linux. Install with: sudo pacman -U treenshoter-1.0.0.pacman
steps.5: FreeBSD: For FreeBSD systems. Follow the specific instructions for your distribution.

thankYou.message: Your download should start automatically in a moment. If it doesn't start, please use the direct link below.

installation.question: How do I install Treenshoter?
installation.answer: Follow the installation instructions specific to your platform. For macOS, open the .dmg file and drag the application to the Applications folder. For Windows, run the .exe installer. For Linux, use the appropriate format for your distribution (AppImage, DEB, RPM, etc.).

free.question: Is the download free?
free.answer: Yes, Treenshoter is completely free and open source. You can download and use it at no cost.

requirements.question: What are the system requirements?
requirements.answer: Treenshoter requires macOS 10.15 or higher, Windows 10 or higher, or a modern Linux distribution. Check the download page for more platform-specific details.

verify.question: How do I verify the file integrity?
verify.answer: You can verify the integrity of the downloaded file using SHA-256 checksums when available. This ensures the file was not corrupted during download.

help.question: I need help with installation
help.answer: Check the installation instructions section on the download page or contact our support through the documentation page.

about.title: About Treenshoter
about.description: Treenshoter is a minimalist application developed with Electron to capture, manage and organize screenshots efficiently. Focused on productivity and simplicity, it offers all the necessary tools without complications.
